greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n)=k is the smallest exponent k such that at least 3 equal decimal digits "n n n" appear in the decimal representation of 2^k (n=0,1,...,9).
reference: E. I. Ignatjew, Mathematische Spielereien, Urania Verlag Leipzig-Jena-Berlin, 2. Auflage 1982
Helmut Kracke, Mathe-musische Knobelisken, Duemmler Bonn, 2. Auflage 1983
results.author: Eva-Maria Zschorn (e-m.zschorn(AT)zaschendorf.km3.de), Dec 06 2009
